pages.text: Narvik is a highly advanced, remote operated fleet consisting of a main ship, a support ship and four bait ships. The main ship can be operated manually or remotely using an auto-pilot and signal relay feature.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/sea_mine)$(l)Deploy Bait Ship/$$(br)Narvik's systems navigate $(l)one of the bait ships/$ to the chosen spot, where it lies in wait. $(l)When a bait ship is it/$, the onboard flares launch, $(l)damaging 4 random opponent tiles/$. This ability has $(l)4 Uses/$ and costs $(l)6 Energy/$ to use. ($(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/narvik_active)Bait Ship)
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/torpedo_net)$(l)Nano-Carbon Net/$$(br)In between the main ship and the support ship lies a large net made of nano-carbon. This net $(l)protects 5 tiles in a row/$ from $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/torpedo)Torpedoes/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
